trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_SEQ_00<tab>By all rights you should be departing for the Crystarium, but Y'shtola does not seem ready to return.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Runar in Slitherbough.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Asgeir and obtain a well-worn broom.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_TODO_02<tab>Take the well-worn broom to Y'shtola.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Thancred.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_ALMET_000_000<tab>So long as we Viis live, we shall preserve the truth of your deeds.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_UIMET_000_001<tab>In the short time we've known you, it feels as though we've experienced a lifetime of adventures. Adventures we are not like to forget.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_CYMET_000_002<tab>Perhaps we should create a new mural in your honor, and as a record for future generations. What do you think?
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_YSHTOLA_000_010<tab>Although we learned naught of the Ascians, the insight we gained into the Echo made our trip worthwhile.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_YSHTOLA_000_011<tab>Before we return to the Crystarium, however, there is a small matter I would attend to in Slitherbough. Might I trouble you to come with me?
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_YSHTOLA_000_012<tab>Thank you. After we arrive, we should have a brief word with Runar.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_YSHTOLA_000_015<tab>Runar appears to be in characteristically high spirits.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_RUNAR_000_020<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It is so good to see you!
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_RUNAR_000_021<tab>You've arrived at a most opportune time. I was preparing a pot of my famous stew. Come, I will ready a place for you.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_YSHTOLA_000_022<tab>I'm sorry, Runar, but we haven't the─
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_RUNAR_000_023<tab>Please, I insist! It will take only a minute.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_YSHTOLA_000_024<tab><sigh> My apologies, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It seems our return to the Crystarium will be delayed.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_YSHTOLA_000_025<tab>But perhaps only for a bit─if you assist me with my work.

TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_YSHTOLA_000_026<tab>I say “work,” but it is rather more a chore. I must clean my chambers here in Slitherbough from top to bottom. If you would be so kind as to go and fetch a broom from Asgeir, we might finish before Runar is done cooking.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_YSHTOLA_000_029<tab>I require a broom if I'm to make any meaningful progress here. I'm sure you can find one if you speak with Asgeir.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_ASGEIR_000_030<tab>A broom for...Master Matoya...?
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_ASGEIR_000_031<tab>I cannot imagine why she would have need of such a thing, but here you are. It is old but sturdy and sure to suffice.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_ASGEIR_000_032<tab>You don't suppose she might be cleaning, do you? ...Should we be concerned?
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_YSHTOLA_000_040<tab>I trust Asgeir was able to find a broom for us?
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_YSHTOLA_000_041<tab>Well worn. Good. This would prove difficult otherwise.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_YSHTOLA_000_042<tab>Though I must say, I think I did rather well for not having a broom thus far.

TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_YSHTOLA_100_042<tab>...Yes, well, you weren't buried beneath a veritable avalanche of books when you entered, were you? Right. Anyway, it is time I finished cleaning with the help of that broom.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_YSHTOLA_000_050<tab>You didn't honestly think I'd do it the old-fashioned way? That broom is more than capable of sweeping by itself. Or rather, it will be... Ahem.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_YSHTOLA_000_051<tab>Time to rise, to swish and sweep, A tidy chamber you must keep. To this task you shall be bound, Until no dust is to be found.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_YSHTOLA_000_052<tab>In this one particular respect, I've no objections to following in Master Matoya's footsteps.

TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_YSHTOLA_000_053<tab>(-Y'shtola-)In future, I may need you to remind me the pursuit of knowledge does not preclude other equally important duties... Such as maintaining clean quarters for said pursuit.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_YSHTOLA_000_054<tab>(-Y'shtola-)<sigh> I will dearly miss this place. These people...
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_RUNAR_000_055<tab>(-Runar-)M-Master Matoya! Pardon the interruption, but the stew is ready.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_YSHTOLA_000_056<tab>Is something troubling you? You've been rather quiet.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_RUNAR_000_057<tab>N-No! Everything is fine, I assure you. It has been a long day, is all.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_YSHTOLA_000_058<tab>I see...
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_ALPHINAUD_000_059<tab>(-???-)Y'shtola! Thank goodness you're still here.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_YSHTOLA_000_060<tab>Alphinaud? I thought you were following Ardbert.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_ALPHINAUD_000_061<tab>I was, though I'm sad to say I lost track of him shortly after entering these woods.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_ALPHINAUD_000_062<tab>He seems determined to traverse every ilm of Norvrandt in his quest to spread the truth of the Warriors of Light and the Flood.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_ALPHINAUD_000_063<tab>And it seems news of your address at the Crystarium precedes him at every destination, making his task all the more simple.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_ALPHINAUD_000_064<tab>It remains to be seen to what end he encourages the people to become Warriors of Light themselves...
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_ALPHINAUD_100_064<tab>...But there is no denying that his words have struck a chord with many.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_ALISAIE_000_065<tab>Well, we're all agreed that this is just another Ascian ploy, yes?

TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_ALISAIE_000_066<tab>They've commandeered corpses before, and to no good end. I see no reason to think this time is any different─especially when it's that of a fallen Warrior of Light.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_ALPHINAUD_000_067<tab>I doubt we'll learn more if we remain a step behind.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_URIANGER_000_068<tab>His next destination is, in all likelihood, Slitherbough...
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_YSHTOLA_000_069<tab>Alisaie, are you certain you should be here?

TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_ALISAIE_000_070<tab>If you're concerned about Halric and the others, you needn't be. Their treatment is going well, but progress is slow and exhausting─for all of us. The best thing I can do now is let them rest. So─I believe we were about to discuss how to arrange a meeting with our would-be Warrior of Light?
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_ALPHINAUD_000_071<tab>Before visiting any towns or villages, Ardbert would hunt down and slay a nearby sin eater to earn the locals' trust.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_ALPHINAUD_000_072<tab>Our best chance of getting ahead of him is to find one before he does.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_URIANGER_000_073<tab>Thankfully, Thancred and Ryne are returned from the Empty and have taken up the search.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_URIANGER_000_074<tab>Ryne believeth one may lurk beneath the boughs of Woven Oath.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_ALPHINAUD_000_075<tab>Then that is where we will start our search.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_RUNAR_000_076<tab>Master Matoya!
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_RUNAR_000_077<tab>I...er... A warm bowl of stew will be awaiting your return.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_YSHTOLA_000_078<tab>I look forward to it.
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_RUNAR_000_080<tab>Please, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I beg of you... Keep her safe...
TEXT_LUCKMH106_03766_RYNE_000_081<tab>I can sense no other sin eaters in the area. I hope this means Ardbert will be coming this way soon.
